config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
for file in "${@}"; do
  # Needs to be run on a file, not a directory
  if [[ ! -f "${file}" ]]; then
    echo "Invalid file: ${file}" >&2
    exit 1
  fi

  # If executable, skip to next loop iteration
  [[ -x "${file}" ]] && continue

  # If we reach here, at least one file is not executable
  echo -n 'false'
  exit 1
done

# If we reach here, all files exist and are executable
echo -n 'true'
taskDescription: Returns true if all paths are executable, else returns false
